testcase.name: Active grid check with the Merge action button details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page navgations......................................passed When The User enters with the username and passwords details................passed And Clicks on the logins button from login details page.....................passed Then the page will be Navigate to the Dashboards home menu..................passed And Dashboard menu click on the Consignment Merge screen....................passed Then check with the Active grid Status type Dropdown selection field........passed And check with the Active grid Select collection center dropdown field......passed Then verify with the From date input selection details......................passed And check with the Vehicle number input details validation..................passed When click on the search details button.....................................passed Then check with the Checkbox selection from the Active grid.................passed When Click on the Merge action button.......................................passed
